body.p: The recoverable amounts (ie higher of value in use and fair value less costs of disposal) of the cash‑generating units are determined on the basis of value in use calculations. At the end of 20X0 and 20X1, the value in use of each cash‑generating unit exceeds its carrying amount. Therefore the activities in each country and the goodwill allocated to those activities are regarded as not impaired.
